sec.title: IT-systems environment neutrality
sec.p: This standard does not assume nor endorse any specific system environment, database management system, database design paradigm, system development methodology, data definition language, command language, system interface, user interface, syntax, computing platform, or any technology required for implementation, i.e., it is information technology neutral. At the same time, this standard maximizes an IT-enabled approach to its implementation and maximizes semantic interoperability.
